options.text: Commission winter garments for poor families.
options.response: Needlework teams clothe dozens before frost deepens.

options.text: Commission altar linens and school cloths.
options.response: Liturgical and school quality both improve.

options.text: Offer to assist the sisters with catechesis for village girls.
options.response: The sisters welcome your help and set you to lessons and needlework for the poor.
